item.title: Apple's App Store Under Investigation in Colombia

item.title: How ‘Dora and the Search for Sol Dorado’ Strengthens Colombia’s Position as a World-Class Shooting Destination
item.description: Being home for a new, fresh take on the legacy of one of the most iconic children’s shows of the 21st century is no small feat, but Colombia was ready to take on the challenge when it came to Paramoun
